news.title: Software patents vs Microsoft antitrust suit: European Commission is going to undermine some of its best work
news.body: Open letter to Mr Borell Fontelles, President of the European Parliament. On July 6th, European Parliament will have to decide on the "Software Patents" directive. By relying on undefined terms and ineffective limits, the text that the Council has handed to the Parliament would allow patents on software standards, business methods, and website development.
